	<style>
		.section {
			border: 1px solid $headerColor;
			padding: 2px;
			text-align: left;
			margin-bottom: 1em;
		}
		.sectionHeader {
			background-color: $headerColor;
			color: $fontOnHeaderColor;
			display: block;
			padding: 2px;
			font-weight: bold;
		}
		table.baseline-aligned td {
			vertical-align: baseline;
		}
                .mytd{
                        text-align: left;border-style: solid; border-width: 1px;
                 }
	</style>
